price: (44) Their greeting the Day they meet Him will be, "Peace." And He has prepared for them a noble reward.
arabic: تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ سَلَٰمٞۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَرِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: taḥiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salāmun wa-aʿadda lahum ajran karīman
